homeHeader.title: Set Up in RAKEZ Free Zone and Scale with Full Ownership and Zero Tax
homeHeader.description: Minimise the risk of licensing approvals, bank account friction, and visa application rejections with our experts guiding you every step of the way. Launch in Ras Al Khaimah’s leading business powerhouse to access lucrative local and global markets, tax-based incentives, and cost-efficient setup solutions. Set up in RAKEZ seamlessly and start growing without the headaches.

leftSection_1.title: Why Choose RAKEZ Free Zone for Your UAE Business
leftSection_1.description: Hundreds of local and international businesses choose  RAKEZ, making it one of the most thriving and profitable business free zones in the UAE.

items.title: Get 100% Foreign Ownership
items.subTitle: Get 100% Foreign Ownership
items.description: Eliminate the hassle of a local sponsor and enjoy complete control over your business setup in RAKEZ free zone. We’re talking full profit repatriation!

items.title: Unlock Exciting Tax Incentives
items.subTitle: Unlock Exciting Tax Incentives
items.description: Take advantage of the favourable tax environment to access double taxation treaties and 0% corporate income taxes, uplifting your bottom line.

items.title: Benefit from Its Strategic Location
items.subTitle: Benefit from Its Strategic Location
items.description: With a world-class networking infrastructure, RAKEZ offers businesses convenient access to all major ports, highways, and airports to strengthen global links.

items.title: Simplify Business Setup
items.subTitle: Simplify Business Setup
items.description: With no physical office required, the RAKEZ free zone supports a fast, paperless setup, allowing businesses to start operating within 5-7 days.

leftSection_2.title: Choose from Diverse Permitted Business Activities

items.title: Commercial License

items.title: General Trading License
items.description: Import and export wholesale with zero minimum inventory requirements.

items.title: E-Commerce License

sec1.title: Join Over 30,000 Companies Thriving in RAKEZ
sec1.description: Global brands are choosing RAK free zone for cost-efficiency, logistics, and support. Start your venture with One Nexuz’s full setup assistance and visa support today.

sec2.title: Start Lean, Scale Confidently—Pay for What You Need
sec2.description: No rigid bundles, no hidden charges. Get custom RAKEZ licensing costs tailored to your unique needs. Pay only for what your business requires and add services as operations scale—without unnecessary overhead.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to get a RAKEZ license?
items.answer: It generally takes 3-5 working days to apply for and issue a RAKEZ trade license.

items.question: What documents do I need to register in the RAKEZ free zone?
items.answer: You’ll need copies of your passport, visa, business plan, memorandum, shareholders’ resolution, certificates of good standing, and trade license.

items.question: Do I need to own a physical office space in RAKEZ?
items.answer: RAKEZ allows businesses to choose from a range of options, including physical office space and flexible alternatives such as flexi-desks and co-working spaces.

items.question: Can I open a bank account with a RAKEZ license?
items.answer: Yes! Our expert business consultants guide you through the process to connect you with the right bank account partner.

items.question: What business activities does the RAKEZ free zone allow?
items.answer: The region supports over 1,500 activities, including commercial, manufacturing, professional, industrial, and educational.
